ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2001_01_10:
’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour! Just remember
that greeting, and everything’ll be OK!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Soooooo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
What kinda content do you have for me today?
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Lookee here—it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve got a hunch that you’re gonna get me
trending... Oh ho hooo!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
I’mma give you this as a symbol of our blossoming
buddyhood!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I expect a full report on that present! Spare no
juicy detail about how you liked using it! Have it
on my desk, uh...whenever, I guess!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
We’ll call this stream “Gym Leader Iono Shows Her
Appreciation—Have a GREAT-ful Day!”
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
That’s why YOU get a present,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here’s a present, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
This gift is gonna go viral—it’s all anyone’s gonna
talk about!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
No need to hold back—we always do right by
each other, don’t we?
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I’m sure you’ll keep promoting the Iono Zone, too,
right? Right?! Nyahahaaa!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Tell me eeeverything! Spare no details!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Chat time with [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I wonder how high my viewer count’ll go!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ], it’s tea time!
Spill ALL your secrets!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
A present for me?! I’m on cloud nine!
No—cloud ten!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Whoa! How do you know EXACTLY what I like,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Holy geez! I’m thrilled—and kinda embarrassed!
Thanks for payin’ such close attention to my
streams!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Thanks for sharing that great content with me!
Feel free to swing by again whenever you’ve got
time to kill!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Wow, I learned a lot! I couldn’t ask for more!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I could use all that to make a video...but I think
I’ll keep our convo saved in my brainspace just
for me!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
Hangin’ out here makes it easy-peasy to meet a
buncha different people!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
If I keep making friendos this fast, I’ll have my
choice of guests for future collabs!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
And THAT means my view count’ll go through the
roof! Nyahahaaa!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
With me as your producer, you’re sure to attract
some attention.
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But whether you become a popular streamer or
not is up to you!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I can’t wait for the day when you make it big and
your channel does a collab with the Iono Zone!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Some of my fans think my older videos were
better, back when I took on riskier challenges
’n stuff...
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But I’ve still got the same goal I’ve always had—
providing loads of fun for all the loyal fans and
friendos watching me!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
If you become an influencer, you always gotta
keep your supporters in mind when you’re making
content!
ch0296_00_nanjamo_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
And that includes me—your producer and
number-one fan!
